name: PawPuzzles
description:
(Leave Feedback to Improve Game)

Puzzle/top down game where you play with the protagonist Pal to navigate the terrain and solve puzzles

Controls

WSAD-move character 

SPACE-teleport

MOUSE & LEFT CLICK BUTTON-move and drop puzzles, double click on treats to consume. 

Num 1 /Num2 -Zoom Camera in and Out
